Merge pull request #349 from ratan12/forumImprovements

Forum improvements

dirty flag rewrite - part 1

The dirty property is now a ArrayList and updated by the setters of the
relevant properties. There is no need to call setDirty() anymore.

dirty flag rewrite - part 2

Added setters for manga properties and changed update api functions to
read the new dirty array and update only changed properties.

Also updated the database to change the dirty field to varchar, the
dirty array is saved as json string in the db
Fix update in DV.onPause() and improve reflection functions
